doc.title: Adventures of Uncle
doc.plot: There is no reliable documentation that any film bearing this title was produced or distributed at this time by either L-KO or Universal. There was no L-KO film released on the alleged 11 December 1914 release date, under this or any other title; this title is either entirely bogus, a figment of some contributor's imagination, or else a working title or a re-release title of another unidentified film.
